HeroSection.title: Digital Cognition, Exponential Solutions
HeroSection.subtitle: We are a creative technology and software development studio. We transform ideas into memorable digital experiences.

ContactPage.title: Let's talk about your project
ContactPage.subtitle: Complete the form and an AI orchestrator will get in touch with you.
ContactPage.statusSuccess: Thank you for your message! We will get in touch soon.

DIYPage.hero_title: Yes, You Can Do This Yourself
DIYPage.hero_subtitle: And we want to be honest with you about that.
DIYPage.hero_description: In an era where AI can generate functional code, we believe in transparency. Here’s the truth about what you can do on your own and where we provide real value.
DIYPage.videos_intro: You can build the application on your own by following these video groups.
DIYPage.videos_work_in_progress: We are currently working on the videos. Please check back later.
DIYPage.videos_trust: In the meantime, feel free to read the following information to trust our services more.
DIYPage.truth_title: The Reality of AI in Development
DIYPage.truth_intro: AI tools have democratized software development. Today, it’s possible to:
truth_items: Generate functional code with ChatGPT, Claude, or Copilot.
Build complete applications using tools like Cursor, Bolt, or Replit.
Create landing pages and websites without writing a single line of code.
Automate complex tasks using no-code/low-code platforms.
DIYPage.truth_conclusion: Many entrepreneurs are already building successful products this way, and that's a great thing.
DIYPage.cost_title: The Hidden Costs of the DIY Approach
DIYPage.cost_subtitle: Let's be honest about the challenges

cost_items.title: The Steep Learning Curve
cost_items.description: It can take weeks or even months to learn the basic concepts of programming, architecture, and deployment.

cost_items.title: Trial and Error
cost_items.description: You can lose hours debugging errors that an experienced developer could solve in minutes.

cost_items.title: Technical Debt
cost_items.description: Architectural decisions that seem right today can become very expensive to fix in the future.

cost_items.title: Your Time is a Valuable Asset
cost_items.description: Every hour you spend on technical problems is an hour you don't invest in growing your business.

DIYPage.value_title: The Value We Bring to the Table
DIYPage.value_subtitle: Why working with us is a smart decision

value_items.title: Experience That Saves You Time
value_items.description: We condense years of experience into quick and effective decisions for your project.

value_items.title: A Complete Team at Your Disposal
value_items.description: You get access to developers, architects, and consultants for a fraction of the cost of hiring them individually.

value_items.title: Scalable Architecture from Day One
value_items.description: We design for growth from the beginning, avoiding costly refactoring in the future.

value_items.title: Focus on What You Do Best
value_items.description: You can focus on your business while we take care of the technical side of things.

comparison_rows.diy: High, with a risk of costly mistakes
comparison_rows.us: Minimized, thanks to our proven experience

comparison_rows.diy: Your time (which is a valuable asset)

comparison_rows.us: Designed for growth from the start

philosophy_items.title: Radical Honesty
philosophy_items.description: We tell you the truth, even if it's not what you want to hear.

philosophy_items.title: Total Transparency
philosophy_items.description: No hidden costs, no empty promises, no smoke and mirrors.

philosophy_items.title: Mutual Growth
philosophy_items.description: We succeed when you succeed. Your success is our success.

philosophy_items.title: Constant Innovation
philosophy_items.description: We use the best tools available, always staying up-to-date with the latest trends.

DIYPage.cta_diy_button: I want to try it myself
